```{r}
b1 = c()
b2 = c()
b3 = c()
for (i in seq(1,100)){
  b1 = append(b1, 60 + rnorm(1))
  b2 = append(b2, 60 + rnorm(1))
  b3 = append(b3, 120 + rnorm(1))
}

trilm = lm(b3 ~ b1 + b2)
summary(trilm)
```
